content.text:
[@myf](@GLH9VPzvvU2KcnnUu2n5oxOqaTUtzw+Rk6fd/Kb9Si0=.ed25519) Hell yeah! I saw a bunch of messages like this in `journalctl`:

> libinput error: event6  - Atmel maXTouch Touchpad: kernel bug: Touch jump detected and discarded. See https://wayland.freedesktop.org/libinput/doc/1.12.0/touchpad-jumping-cursor.html for details.

I've opened an issue here: https://bugs.freedesktop.org/show_bug.cgi?id=108104
